getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; toggle(value: string): string }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the toggle. Useful for composition.

loop.description: Whether to loop focus inside the toggle group.

multiple.description: Whether to allow multiple toggles to be selected.

onValueChange.description: Function to call when the toggle is clicked.

orientation.description: The orientation of the toggle group.

rovingFocus.description: Whether to use roving tab index to manage focus.

value.description: The values of the toggles in the group.
